qr.title: My QR Code
qr.subtitle: Share your emergency medical information
qr.description: This QR code contains your emergency medical information

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.step1: Download or print your QR code
instructions.step2: Keep it in your wallet, phone case, or visible location
instructions.step3: In case of emergency, medical personnel can scan it
instructions.step4: They will instantly access your critical medical information

tips.title: Tips
tips.informFamily: Inform family members about your QR
tips.regularCheck: Check your QR code works regularly

disclaimer.title: Important Notice
disclaimer.text: This information is provided for emergency medical purposes only. Always verify critical information when possible.

hero.title: Your health.
hero.description: Your complete and secure digital medical record. Instant access to your medical history, exams, diagnoses, and treatments from any authorized health center. Faster consultations that save you up to 70% of waiting time.
hero.loginButton: Already have an account - Log In

features.title: Everything you need to take care of your health
features.description: Simple and powerful tools to give you complete control of your medical information

feature1.title: Your History Always With You
feature1.description: All your medical information organized in one place. Access your data from any device whenever you need it.

feature2.title: QR for Emergencies
feature2.description: A QR code that can save your life. Paramedics instantly access your allergies and critical medical conditions.

feature3.title: Faster Consultations
feature3.description: The doctor already has your history before seeing you. More efficient consultations that save you up to 70% of waiting time.

feature4.title: Maximum Security
feature4.description: Your medical data protected with the highest security standards. Only you decide who can see it.

feature5.title: Ideal for Professionals
feature5.description: If you're a doctor or paramedic, quickly access your patients' information to provide better care.

feature6.title: Multi-Platform Access
feature6.description: Available on computers, tablets, and mobile devices. Your secure medical record from any authorized device.

testimonials.title: Real stories from people like you
testimonials.description: Discover how VitalGo is improving the lives of patients and health professionals in Colombia

testimonial1.name: Dr. MarÃ­a GonzÃ¡lez
testimonial1.role: Internal Medicine Physician - Hospital San Ignacio
testimonial1.content: VitalGo changed the way I handle emergencies. Now I have patient information instantly, without waiting or paperwork.

testimonial2.name: Carlos RodrÃ­guez
testimonial2.content: I spent years carrying folders with my test results. Now everything is on my phone and my family can access it if something happens to me.

testimonial3.name: Ana Patricia Silva
testimonial3.content: In emergencies every second counts. With VitalGo I can see the patient's allergies and conditions before arriving at the hospital.

cta.title: Your health deserves to be in good hands
cta.description: Join thousands of people who already have their secure and always accessible digital medical record. Quick registration with medical identity verification.
